Alert Name: bush
Democrats take aim at Asian currencies
Lawmakers vow action on a practice they see as undermining American jobs.
05/09/07 03:16 PM, EDT
Senior Democrats in the House of Representatives vowed Wednesday to pass legislation aimed at protecting American jobs by pressuring China and Japan to raise the value of their currencies.
